home.title: Hey there, i'm
home.description: Welcome to my Portfolio. Here, you'll know more about me! Under you find my CV and Social Medias to contact.

description.content: My name is Jean Lima, I'm from the state of Bahia and I'm 19 years old. I'm passionate about Computing and I'm currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, which I really enjoy and have been interested in since childhood. I am a Fullstack Javascript developer, with a focus on front-end development.
